Name: Battle Imagine - Muku Warrior
Description:
Use to activate or upgrade Muku Warrior's Battle Imagine skill: Stunt! Super Critical.

Stunt! Super Critical
Summon Elite: Muku Warrior to leap forward and deliver a powerful strike, dealing AoE Attack Damage. This attack is guaranteed to Crit.
Upon the skill cast, your Crit andcritical DMG are increased for a period.
Description$english:
Use to activate or upgrade Muku Warrior's Battle Imagine skill: Stunt! Super Critical.

Stunt! Super Critical

Description2$english: A crystallization of thoughts, consciousness, and Engram, possessing supernatural power. This principle has not been unraveled since the Bapharian civilization.
